attributes.action: grant equal rights for England , Scotland and Wales by granting two further Bank Holidays, to a total of 10, equivalent to the ten enjoyed by residents of Northern Ireland, and that he recommends that the two  new holidays are 'St George's Day' on 23rd April and 'Old Billy Day' on 25th November eachyear.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please see separate new Old Billy and old, expired St George's Day petitions!
